sentences.english: I have to work at daytime, so going to evening classes is the best choice for me.
sentences.chinese: 白天我要上班，所以上夜校是一个很好的选择。

sentences.english: She was accompanied by her brother for the night school.
sentences.chinese: 她与她的兄弟就伴一同去上夜校。

sentences.english: Training programs on holiday and at night are also available.
sentences.chinese: 也可根据需要举办假日班或夜校班。

sentences.english: She studied shorthand and typewriting at evening classes for which the company paid.
sentences.chinese: 后来她上夜校学速记和打字，费用由公司负担。

sentences.english: After attending evening classes Grandpa became more open-minded.
sentences.chinese: 老大爷上夜校以后，脑筋更开通了。

sentences.english: She did a year's work a term and went to night classes.
sentences.chinese: 她一个学期学完一年的课程，晚上去上夜校。

sentences.english: Mr Wopsle's great-aunt kept an evening school in the village;
sentences.chinese: 沃甫赛先生的姑婆在村子里创办了一所夜校。
她上夜校一贯按时出席。

sentences.english: After dinner, I go to night school.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后，我还要到夜校上课。

sentences.english: I took an evening course at the Tourism School of Beijing after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后我参加了北京旅游学院的夜校。

sentences.english: BI know, but I'm going to enroll in a night school to take a course in business management.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，但是我想报读夜校，参加企业管理的课。

sentences.english: In my spare-time, I teach night classes.
sentences.chinese: 业余时间我在夜校授课。

sentences.english: There are lot training classed or night classes.
sentences.chinese: 有许多培训锻炼班与夜校。

sentences.english: She decided to go to the evening school regardless of her parents’ strong objection.
sentences.chinese: 她不顾父母的强烈反对，决定去上夜校。

sentences.english: A-You must get tired with night school and your regular job.
sentences.chinese: 既要读夜校又要上班，你一定很累。

sentences.english: To attend evening schools is all the fashion now in China.
sentences.chinese: 目前，读夜校在中国极为风行。

definition: to transfer (from production to other duties)/to take leave (for study or other job)/to dispose of property/to transfer assets (to avoid liability)
partly released from productive labor/partly released from one's regular work
college for people who attend after work
vocational high school/abbr. for 技工學校|技工学校[ji4 gong1 xue2 xiao4]/abbr. for 技術學校|技术学校[ji4 shu4 xue2 xiao4]
vocational secondary school/technical secondary school/trade school/abbr. for 中等專科學校|中等专科学校
vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
